Notes.Text:
This update for libass fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2020-26682: Fixed a signed integer overflow in the call to outline_stroke() (bsc#1177862).
Notes.Title: Details

Vulnerabilities.Description: In libass 0.14.0, the `ass_outline_construct`'s call to `outline_stroke` causes a signed integer overflow.
